value.heading: Birth
body: Born 20 Days before the Due Date
value.moral: I complete the work well before the Deadline.

value.heading: SSC
body: Scored 85.27%(like you care how much i scored in SSC)
My Dream College had a cut off of 85.57 i.e. 2 marks more than I had.
value.moral: I know the value of Each and Every mark and would not take anything for granted.

value.heading: Jr. College
body: Could have gone to other big colleges, but selected to go to nearby small Junior college with IT Subject.
value.moral: I don't mind working in Start-ups.

value.heading: HSC
body: Got inspired by '3 Idiots' movie and selected engineering.

value.heading: After Engineering.
body: No idea what to write, but have to make this about page bigger.
